name: BulletSharp
tagline: .NET wrapper for the Bullet physics library
body:
**BulletSharp** is a complete .NET wrapper for the [Bullet](http://bulletphysics.org/wordpress/) physics library written in C++/CLI. It has bindings to Axiom, Mogre, [OpenTK](http://www.opentk.com/), [SharpDX](http://sharpdx.org/), [SlimDX](http://code.google.com/p/slimdx/), XNA, MonoGame, and Windows API Code Pack. The stand-alone Generic package includes its own math classes. **Binaries:** * [bulletsharp-2.83.zip](http://bit.ly/13yvJha) * [bulletsharp-2.83.zip](http://bit.ly/13yvJha) * [bulletsharp-demos-2.83.zip](http://bit.ly/1xm09RU) * [bulletsharp-x64-2.83.zip](http://bit.ly/1CSSlpw) * [bulletsharp-net2-2.82.zip](http://bit.ly/1gmpC3z) * [All Downloads](https://googledrive.com/host/0B2TPMwtggT0jamt6VDhXVTJwOXc/) Try the new experimental cross-platform version for Linux and Windows:
* [bulletsharp-pinvoke-0.5.zip](https://googledrive.com/host/0B2TPMwtggT0jamt6VDhXVTJwOXc/BulletSharp%20P%2FInvoke/bulletsharp-pinvoke-0.5.zip) * [bulletsharp-pinvoke-demos-0.5.zip](https://googledrive.com/host/0B2TPMwtggT0jamt6VDhXVTJwOXc/BulletSharp%20P%2FInvoke/bulletsharp-pinvoke-demos-0.5.zip) **Note:** BulletSharp will not work on the Xbox 360 or any other fully managed environment, because it wraps the Bullet library, which is unmanaged. An alternative may be [Bullet-XNA](http://code.google.com/p/bullet-xna/). *Development for Bullet 3 has moved to* https://github.com/AndresTraks/BulletSharp Are you using BulletSharp in your project or thinking about it? **Answer a few questions and leave feedback [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1MiXJ_nTQ_N0xxx1jS69SCoT2Y_hS1U4CTXMdFQZ6ZgU/viewform)**.
